word_mean: 连合：相应部分的联合处，见commissura
也用于心脏瓣膜的相邻瓣尖之间的接合部位

sentence.Network_en: The transverse fibres or commissure unite the two ganglia of a pair.
sentence.Network_cn: 横行的纤维即接索则把成对的两个神经节连在一起.

sentence.Network_en: It was interesting that the VIP neurons were also found in anterior commissure nucleus.
sentence.Network_cn: vip样神经元也出理于前连合核,此发现尚未见报道.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 连字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 连锅端〖 removeordestroylock,stockandbarrel〗 连合〖 commissure〗 连衡〖 unite〗.
commissural tract 交连径commissure 交连commissure 连合
commissioning trial 交工试验commissure 对接commissure 接缝
commissure 对接commissure 接缝commit 犯;干;把……交托给

list.abs: commissural neuron 连合神经元commissural tract 交连径commissure 交连
anterior cerebellar incesure 小脑前切迹anterior commissure 前连合anterior corticospinal tract 皮质脊髓前束
commissural fiber 连合纤维commissural neuron 连合神经元commissural tract 交连径
...和右部分。构成边缘系统的主要部分是海马和杏仁核。左右脑由胼胝体(corpus calosum)连接，而边缘系统的左右部分是由海马连合(hippocampal commissure)所联合。当左右脑同时运动的时候，边缘系统负责情绪、动机、条件反射、记忆储存等中枢活动的协同和调节。对.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin commissura 'junction', from committere 'join' (see commit)
